name: Police Chase Free by Top Free Games Factory
name_original: Police Chase Free by Top Free Games Factory
description:
Police Chase is a thrilling, fast paced motorcycle police chase game! With cool graphics, fun game play, simple tilt based controls, turbo boosts, and an exciting super turbo mode, you WILL NOT be able to put this game down!

FEATURES

-> 4 different environments!
-> Standard & super turbo boost modes.
-> Easy controls. Just tilt your device -- That's it!
-> Fun soundtrack and special sound effects.

HOW TO PLAY

-> Tilt device to control the police bike.
-> Avoid all the oncoming traffic on the road.
-> Press TURBO button to activate the turbo boost.
-> While in turbo mode, fill up the turbo meter to go into super turbo mode!
-> Catch the bad guys.
